section.Subtitle: Summary
section.Paragraph: This project started with an examination of the travel planning process. User research candidates were sourced with a variety of travel habits from frequent international travelers to group roadtrippers. These candidates were asked to step through their standard travel planning process while thinking out loud as we observed.
